alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:59PM CST until January 29 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Monticello. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 23.3 feet. - . - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.3 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Monticello 22.0 23.3 Thu 8 pm CST 23.1 22.1 20.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 900 AM CST.
